description: This file is a web page for troubleshooting logs, including HTML structure, embedded JavaScript for dynamic behavior, and PHP includes for header and footer. It allows users to filter and view different types of logs with AJAX-powered content updates.

methods.name: adjust_acs_tb
methods.description: Adjusts table headers and summaries for accessibility and styling, setting the headers based on provided array.

methods.name: ajaxDo
methods.description: Performs an AJAX request to fetch and populate log data based on mode and time frame, then updates the UI accordingly.
